criteria.criterion: Threat summary bar with blocked attacks count, active DDoS mitigations, and open NSG rule violations
criteria.evidence: Top KPI bar in PageContent renders all three metrics with clear labels and values.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: add trend arrows and previous-period comparison for each KPI.

criteria.criterion: Geographic attack map showing top source countries with threat counts
criteria.evidence: Map-style panel displays top source countries with threat totals and visual hotspots.
criteria.gap: Limited interaction for drilling into a country segment.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Add click-to-filter behavior to update the firewall events table by selected country.

criteria.criterion: Filterable table of recent firewall events with columns: timestamp, source IP, destination, action (allow/deny), rule name, severity badge
criteria.evidence: Events table includes all required columns and supports filtering/search controls.
criteria.gap: Filter state is not persisted when switching focus across panels.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Persist active filters in component state and show chips for active filter context.

criteria.criterion: Side panel showing NSG recommendations grouped by priority (critical, high, medium)
criteria.evidence: Right-side panel groups recommendations by critical/high/medium priority sections.
criteria.gap: Recommendations do not expose confidence/risk rationale inline.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Add a short rationale line and estimated risk reduction value for each recommendation.

criteria.criterion: Copilot suggestions: 'Which NSG rules are too permissive?' and 'Show me denied traffic from the last hour'
criteria.evidence: Page header includes both specified Copilot suggestion prompts in the suggestion list.
criteria.gap: Prompt click behavior is static and does not pre-apply related filters yet.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Wire each prompt to a context action that pre-filters data and opens relevant panel focus.
